銘心刻骨.definition: lit. etched into one's heart and bones (idiom); fig. etched in one's memory; remembered with gratitude as long as one lives

銘心鏤骨.definition: engraved in one's heart and carved in one's bones (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives; undying gratitude

銘瑄.definition: MaxSun, PRC company specializing in video and computer display

銘謝.definition: to express gratitude (esp. in public); vote of thanks; also written 鳴謝|鸣谢
